blocks.subject: Amendment Agreement - Royal Bank of Canada
text: We have received an executed Amendment Agreement dated October 9, 2001 to the ISDA Master Agreement between Enron North America Corp. ("ENA") and Royal Bank of Canada ("RBC") dated as of February 15, 1995.  This Amendment revises (1) certain definitions in the Credit Support Annex and (2) the notification information for ENA and RBC.
